stdware/qwindowkit

Cross-platform window customization framework for Qt

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Window docking system for Qt
  • Frameless window for PyQt and PySide on Windows, Linux and macOS
  • GUI for managing virtual machines
  • instant-loading web apps with Qwik
  • Cross-platform window creation library in Rust for Tauri apps
  • Material Design stylesheet for PySide and PyQt
  • Customizable desktop environment for Windows with tiling window manager and app launcher
  • VR window manager for Linux on Godot
  • customizable keyboard firmware for AVR and ARM controllers
